channel.title: Nsfnet on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Nsfnet on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: NSFNET reunion, a perspective
item.description: I was at the NSFNET 20th reunion last week. Here's some notes after the fact. I took good notes on URLs mentioned on delicious - look at http://del.icio.us/vielmetti/nsfnet to get the running commentary as I was trying to do it. History is written by the winners, and thus the NSFNET history was written by the winners - the winners of the 1987 contract to manage it (Merit, MCI and IBM), and those who personally or corporately won out when the backbone was transformed from a research and educational network into a commercial one.

item.title: Dave Mills on Routing in the Internet Swamp
item.description: I’m in DC for the NSFNET reunion - here’s a deck from 1999 that Dave Mills put together on the view of routing in the Internet in the 1980s. | View| Upload your own
